template.name: xmlLayoutTabsActivity
template.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:fitsSystemWindows="true">
<androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_above="@+id/adViewtop" android:fitsSystemWindows="true">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:fitsSystemWindows="true" android:theme="@style/ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Dark.ActionBar">
<androidx.appcompat.widget.Toolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="?attr/actionBarSize" android:gravity="top" android:minHeight="?attr/actionBarSize" app:layout_scrollFlags="scroll|enterAlways" app:popupTheme="@style/ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Light" app:titleMarginTop="15dp" />
<com.google.android.material.tabs.TabLayout android:id="@+id/tabs" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="?attr/actionBarSize" android:layout_gravity="bottom" app:tabIndicatorColor="@android:color/white" app:tabMode="fixed" />
</com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout>
<FrameLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_above="@+id/adViewtop" app:layout_behavior="@string/appbar_scrolling_view_behavior">
<androidx.viewpager.widget.ViewPager android:id="@+id/container" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" />
<include layout="@layout/base_layout_no_data"/>
</FrameLayout> </androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout>
<RelativeLayout android:layout_centerHorizontal="true" android:layout_alignParentBottom="true" android:id="@+id/adViewtop" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content"/>
</RelativeLayout>
template.description: actionbar movable with tabs, ads at bottom
